languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} MP until the end of the turn. They do not lose MP after performing attacks. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Воин{/g} немедленно восстанавливает все {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} ОП до конца хода. После совершения атаки ОП сохраняются. В этом ходу у воина нет ограничений на число атак {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашным{/g} оружием.

traits.locale_text:
The Fighter immediately restores all AP and MP and gains +<u>Fighter's AGI bonus</u> movement points until the end of turn, and doesn't lose MP after performing attacks.
This turn the Fighter has no limit on melee weapon attacks.

The Fighter immediately restores all AP and MP and gains +<u>Fighter's AGI bonus</u> MP until the end of the turn. They don't lose MP after performing attacks. The Fighter has no limit on melee weapon attacks this turn.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} MP until the end of the turn. They do not lose MP after performing attacks. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn.

The Fighter immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}MP{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. They don't lose MP after performing attacks. The Fighter has no limit on melee weapon attacks this turn.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} MP until the end of the turn. They do not lose MP after performing attacks. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}立刻恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，并额外获得{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}点移动点数，效果持续至{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。战士攻击之后移动点数不再耗尽，且本回合{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器没有攻击次数限制。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} MP until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. They do not lose MP after performing attacks. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn.

traits.locale_text: 战士立刻恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，并获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}移动点数{/g}，等同于<u>（2×战士的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>，直到{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。战士的攻击不再消耗移动点数。战士本回合近战武器没有攻击次数限制。

战士立刻恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，并获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}移动点数{/g}，等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}，直到{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。战士的攻击不再消耗移动点数。战士本回合近战武器没有攻击次数限制。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} recupera inmediatamente todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y obtiene + {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} PM hasta el final del turno. No pierde PM por lanzar ataques. El guerrero no tiene límite de ataques con arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} este turno.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} MP until the end of the turn. They do not lose MP after performing attacks. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn.

traits.locale_text: El guerrero recupera inmediatamente todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y obtiene + {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} PM hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が瞬時に全回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時までMPが+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}増加する。攻撃を繰り出してもMPは減らない。このターン、ファイターは{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器による攻撃に制限がない。

traits.locale_text: Боец немедленно восстанавливает все {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и получает +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} бойца</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}ОП{/g} до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. После совершения атаки ОП сохраняются. В этом ходу у бойца нет ограничений на число атак рукопашным оружием.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} erhält augenblicklich sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} zurück und erlangt +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} BP bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g}. Nach Angriffen verliert er keine BP, und er hat in diesem Zug kein Limit auf {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} MP until the end of the turn. They do not lose MP after performing attacks. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn.

traits.locale_text: Der Krieger erhält augenblicklich sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} zurück und erlangt +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} BP bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g}. Nach Angriffen verliert er keine BP, und er hat in diesem Zug kein Limit auf Nahkampfangriffe.

Der Kämpfer erhält augenblicklich sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}BP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} zurück und erlangt +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}BP{/g} bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g}. Nach Angriffen verliert er keine BP, und er hat in dieser Runde kein Limit auf Nahkampfangriffe.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g} récupère immédiatement tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, et bénéficie de +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} PD jusqu'à la fin du tour. Il ne perd pas de PD après avoir attaqué. Aucune limite ne s'applique aux attaques à l'arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} du guerrier au cours de ce tour.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} MP until the end of the turn. They do not lose MP after performing attacks. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn.

traits.locale_text: Le Combattant récupère immédiatement tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, et bénéficie de +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} du Combattant</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}PD{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Il ne perd pas de PM après avoir attaqué. Aucune limite ne s'applique aux attaques à l'arme de mêlée du Combattant au cours de ce tour.

Le Combattant récupère immédiatement tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, et bénéficie de +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}PD{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Il ne perd pas de PM après avoir attaqué. Aucune limite ne s'applique aux attaques à l'arme de mêlée du Combattant au cours de ce tour.
